header.subtitle: POLITRANS LOGIST vă oferă servicii de transport si expediții rutiere de mărfuri pe rute internaționale pentru orice tip de mărfuri si pentru orice destinații.

card.title: POLITRANS LOGIS
card.subtitle: Este partenerul Dumneavoastră de încredere în domeniul serviciilor de transport național și internațional de mărfuri, servicii de logistică, depozitare și formalități vamale la import și export .

card.five: Servicii de Transport Cu și Fără Frigidere

we.title: DESPRE NOI
we.strong: Compania POLITRANS LOGIST SRL a fost fondata in anul 1995.
we.text: Suntem membrul titular al Asociației Transportului Auto Internațional din Moldova si membru al Camerei de Comerț Moldo-Americane. POLITRANS LOGIST SRL vă oferă servicii de transport si expediții rutiere de mărfuri pe rute internaționale pentru orice tip de mărfuri si pentru orice destinații. Echipa noastră de profesioniști cu experiență vastă în industria transporturilor internaționale de marfuri asigură integral suportul necesar unor astfel de servicii si va asigura in permanență soluțiile optime pentru cerințele Dvs. Oferim servicii de transport național si internațional de mărfuri, servicii de logistică, depozitare si formalități vamale la import si export . POLITRANS LOGIST ofera clienților soluții optime, asigurând standarde înalte la fiecare etapă operationala. Garantăm servicii rapide si eficiente pentru toate tipurile de transport marfar si formalități vamale.

license.title: POLITRANS LOGIST Servicii de Calitate
license.first: Our quality and environmental management system is certified according to DIN EN ISO 9001 and 14001
license.sec: Video security in warehouses & GPS location of all vehicles
license.fourth: HACCP concept with risk assessment in compliance with legal requirements
license.five: Member of German logistics-industry security initiative Schutz-und Aktionsgemeinschaft zur Erhöhung der Sicherheit in der Spedition (s.a.f.e)
license.six: Regular employee training on all levels

advantage.title: Inventăm soluții de lungă durată pentru lanțul de aprovizionare

answer.title: Main advantages of road transport
answer.text: At POLITRANS LOGIST, we have more than three decades of experience in commercial and freight transport, so we know in detail the advantages and the disadvantages of road transport. Here we give you the keys for you to evaluate and decide if this is the type of logistics that best suits your needs.

first.title: It is the most profitable
first.text: Road transport is the cheapest means of transport available. The main reason is that a truck is not as expensive as a ship or a place, and it does not require a large specific infrastructure such as ports, stations, or airports.

sec.title: It is the fastest and most agile
sec.text: Although other means are faster, road transport is much more agile. The preparation of the shipment and the start-up of the service is much more immediate, and it makes it the most efficient option for short and medium distances of up to 2,500 km.

th.title: Flexibility of schedules and volumes
th.text: Planes, trains, or ships have a rigid pre-determined schedule and pre-fixed routes. Road transport, on the other hand, offers greater flexibility to adapt to delivery times and to adapt to delivery times and quantity of packages, with options such as groupage transport. Unlike air transport, which prohibits the transport of dangerous or special goods, road transport has no limitations. By truck it is possible to ship flammable or toxic products, cold products, heavy machinery, small packages, etc. (you name it!)

fourth.title: Maximum traceability
fourth.text: GPS and new fleet management software make it easy to always locate and track goods. In addition to real-time information, this makes it possible to anticipate problems such as road closures or the arrival of storms.

five.title: Door-to-door service
five.text: The trailer loads the goods at the same dock of the company that carries out the shipment and unloads them with maximum guarantees at the destination warehouse. IT is a direct service that does not require other means, ideal for the transport of perishable goods.

six.title: Easy paperwork
six.text: Compared to sea or air transport, the paperwork involved in road transport is much simpler. The time spent at customs or on delivery of the goods is much shorter, streamlining the business supply chain.
